name: Chest Push from 3 point stance
description: Explosive medicine ball chest pass from three-point athletic stance with step into throw, developing upper body power and lower body drive
instructions: Begin in a three point stance, squatted down with your back flat and one hand on the ground. Place the medicine ball directly in front of you.
To begin, take your first step as you pull the ball to your chest, positioning both hands to prepare for the throw.
As you execute the second step, explosively release the ball forward as hard as possible.
